timeline.message: Add: published and draft uploaded dates populated

timeline.bodyText: Hey Ankit, please uncomment all these tests.
timeline.author: benradey

timeline.bodyText: Unless this is still necessary for some reason, can you delete this line?
timeline.author: benradey

replies.bodyText: This does not seem necessary now, I have removed it.
replies.author: ankkit24

timeline.bodyText: This isn't a BIG deal, but since I asked for other changes anyway, can you make sure that the key property is not only uniquely named, but also has something to do with its purpose? So in this case, change it from "transient-source_" to "published-date_" or something like that. Same thing for the 'date uploaded' field below. Please update attributes, especially key and id when appropriate as a general rule.
timeline.author: benradey

replies.bodyText:
Yes Ben, I will take care of this.
Even I feel these changes are necessary.
replies.author: ankkit24

timeline.bodyText: Again not a big deal here, but can you just revert this file since there are no meaningful changes?
timeline.author: benradey

timeline.bodyText: Ah, same thing here, if there are no meaningful changes in this file then please revert it.

replies.bodyText:
Did the changes here as well.
I don't see any changes apart from an extra space, which I have taken care of.
